A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
It's really half a thirty percent film\, half an eighty percent film.

 The course of events surrounding snoke/kylo and luke/rey were very well done\, With Kylo truly showing his power and Luke also making masterful strokes.

Sadly\, erstwhile the Poe/Holdo and Finn/Rose events are terrilbly put together\, largely inconsequential. Worse yet\, in terms of the Poe/Holdo cruiser bits\, don't make sense even within the universe ascribed in this episode\, let alone the rest of the series.

 It earns one star because while it's closer to the 56% rating it has earned thus far\, that's really an unacceptable result for a star wars movie.
